:::Starscream:::

::He gets hit by most of the bullets. His head is now bleeding mech 
fluid. he fires 25 shots from each gun at Nighteyes::





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Screaming at the firepower of Starscream, Nighteyes sprints 
as fast as 
> her bleeding legs carry her. By far, she is the most damaged 
Predacon in this 
> whole mess.
>        Looking back at her attacker, she jumps and manuvers herself 
up into a 
> large tree. There, she waits only a moment before leaping from the 
green 
> brush of leaves and asending on Starscream with two pistols raining 
down 
> blasts on him. As the shots fall, so do the drops of mech off of 
her body.
> 
>        Megatron watches as Killfest come back with four more 
explosion 
> blasts. He braced himself, and was sent rolling violently. He got 
up 50 yards 
> further from him. With one eye gone, and now a middle finger 
snapped off 
> somewhere, and a portion of his hip to accompany it, he was leaking 
mech.
>        He held out his Tailgun, and fired 15 shots after Killfest. 
Some aimed 
> for him legs, others at his chest, and three for his face. Megatron 
was going 
> to damage this bot, there was no escaping it. He wanted to put 
Killfest 
> through misery.
> 
>        Tankkor began to rip the tenticles off of his large Vhicon 
body, but 
> they began to overwheal the titan. He yelled, thrashed, and sent 
off shots 
> into mid air. Turning, he aimed for a tree and fired.
>        The tree burst into a spectacular fire freenzy and soon, the 
> neighboring trees around it became engulfed. The battle scene soon 
became an 
> inferno, complete with falling brush, smoke, ash, and an incredible 
heat.
> 
>        Marine winced as a branch covered in flames fell near him. 
He looked 
> at Endbringer, and bent down on one knee, coughing from the smoke. 
He aimed 
> his missle launcher for Endbringers back, where he assumed the 
tenticles 
> sprouted from. He fired five deafining bursts.
> 
>        Tarantulas slowly backed away, his face cover, "Oh no..." He 
rasped 
> silently, waiting to get hit by Greven. He held out his gun in 
front of his 
> and fired a round of 25 blasts at him.
> 
>        Aerostreak dives to Grevens back, two of his claws extended 
and aimed 
> to dig into the bots backside.
> 
>        Akron sees Scather disappear, but she continues forward. The 
shound of 
> the struggling kept her on his trail. She sent out 4 energon blasts 
in a 
> line, one of them bound to hit him.
> 
>        Putnam was sent slamming itno a tree, one engulfed in fire. 
He jetted 
> back into the sky, now with a light singe covering his silver 
armor. He 
> watched as Akron fired on Scyther and Darkmouse, with a slight clue 
to what 
> direction they were in. He joined her.
> 
>        Odiphious and Venus rise to join Putnam and Akron. Now with 
Darkmouse 
> invisable, it would be difficult to hit her from the ground. Venus, 
with her 
> lasso, tossed it out in the direction of the shots.
